name: sucneqoni

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wne(c0, c1))
-| wi(wtru, wceq(c0, csuc(c1)))
-| wi(wtru, wcel(c1, con0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wne(c0, c1)
-| wi(wtru, wceq(c0, csuc(c1)))
-| wi(wtru, wcel(c1, con0))

|- wne(c0, c1)
-| wi(wtru, wcel(c1, con0))
-| wceq(c0, csuc(c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ≠ c1
⊣ (T → c1 ∈ On)
⊣ c0 = suc(c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wne(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, csuc(c1))
-| wcel(c1, con0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ≠ c1
⊣ c0 = suc(c1)
⊣ c1 ∈ On

comment: Inequality of an ordinal set with its successor. Does not use the axiom of regularity. (Contributed by ML, 18-Oct-2020.)
